about_the_game:
Design your garden from a plethora of different types of flowers and plants in all kinds of colors on the same screen you were just working on. Take seeds from grown plants and unlock new varieties. Create special environments and get unique plant options.


Experience your garden in completely different ways at different times during the day. Some flowers go to rest at night, others only unfold in full moonlight. Lock the daytime if you only want to enjoy day or night (daylight/night mode).


See the changes in your garden as soon as the weather changes. Whether rain, fog or sunshine - there is always a flower that really enjoys the current weather.


Choose between two different screen modes to create your own garden area. Choose the free mode, in which you can move to the sides, or the border mode, which adjusts to your screen and lets you design your garden on all four sides.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2018
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
